name: ChainIDE
introduce: ChainIDE is a cloud-based IDE for creating decentralized applications to deploy on blockchains such as Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon, Conflux, Nervos, Dfinity, Flow, etc. It fasts the development cycle and has pre-installed plugins that save users' time and effort. It has modules for writing, compiling, debugging, testing, deploying a smart contract, and much more.
